alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 08 at 5:51AM PST until January 08 at 1:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON ALONG THE BASE OF THE OREGON BLUE MOUNTAINS... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory along the base of the Blue Mountains, southeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. For the High Wind Warning along the base of the Blue Mountains, southeast winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 1 AM PST Sunday. For the High Wind Warning, from 1 AM to 1 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds can blow down trees and power lines and create power outages. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds are expected along the base and slopes of the Blue Mountains. Routes affected include Interstate 84, Highway 11, and Highway 395.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
